intro: A heartwarming "menhera" horror adventure where reality and fiction intertwine, starring VTuber Chinami Dokugai as herself in a fully voiced role.
description:
As you spend blissful days with Chinami, the memory of your first meeting and her feelings begin to quietly distort beneath the surface.
Experience an addictive story that blends sweetness with creeping horror.


◆Synopsis
“Call me Chinami. We're in a relationship, after all.”

You're spending a lovey dovey relationship with Chinami Dokugai, a popular streamer.
Even while busy with work, you always find time to go on dates and enjoy each other company.

From here on, you will keep going on dates and even travel together with Chinami.
And maybe… beyond that—

But... wait...

Come to think of it… how did you and Chinami meet in the first place?


◆Characters
・Dokugai Chinami（CV: Dokugai Chinami）
Your first ever girlfriend.
Stylish, beautiful, and very talkative. She is also a popular streamer.
She eagerly closes the distance between you, leaving you constantly flustered and on edge.

But for some reason, you can't remember where, when, or how you met her.


◆SPECIAL THANKS
Starring / Main Role: Dokugai Chinami
Illustrations: Maneki Kamiya
Plot & Scenario Supervision: Kanata Hoshino (Re,AER)
Scenario: Taiga Akizuki (Re,AER)
Main Theme: Tsumugi Kotobuki

Recommended For:
・Those who want to enjoy a mature date with Chinami Dokugai
・Those who love heart racing & suspenseful situations
・Fans of "Menhera": obsession, possessiveness, and emotional dependency
・Those who can accept her as she is with patience and kindness

○Novel Game Brand "Rabbitfoot”
A novel game brand that delivers novel games casting active YouTubers and VTubers as game characters.
As well as using their names and nicknames, you can enjoy the different sides of your faves and feel a close connection through the novel game that you cannot experience in the usual streaming or video uploads.
